author: robbie
msg: QPID-2731, QPID-2741, QPID-2742: Enable the MessageStoreTest to run for the DerbyMessageStore. Test update of queue exclusivity. Apply various fixes to allowtest to pass (correct exchange count checks, flush messages to the store, delete store directory properly, check for the proper value for selector argument, add ability to unregister virtualhosts from the registry)

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2742: Gather exchange type name properly, and remove the extraneous statement execution and move its closure after use use the output ResultSet.

author: kelly
msg: Module "workflow" now functional; add Dough Lea's "concurrent" as dependency; adjust dependencies and versions; change package decls, imports, and resource paths from gov.nasa.jpl to org.apache; from ".cas." from commons imports; change names of condition classes; add XML processing instruction decls to XML files that were missing it; add ASF notices to XML files, prop files, and scripts; replace import for DateConvert to oodt-commons version; adjust class names in example task files; add FIXME notice re namespace URI; add ASF notice to SQL file

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2741: issue the shutdown command to Derby during close()

author: rmuir
msg: remove dependency of test-core on build-contrib (only needed by redundant test code)
